LanguageData.TableGrill.label: Parrilla sencilla
LanguageData.TableGrill.description: Una pequeña parrilla se utiliza para cocinar la carne en simple sacudidas o asados. Puede ser alimentado por leña, carbón vegetal, carbón mineral y material de madera.
LanguageData.TableGrill_Blueprint.label: simple grill (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableGrill_Blueprint_Install.label: simple grill (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableGrill_Frame.label: simple grill (building)
LanguageData.TableGrill_Frame.description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky or roasts. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.ButcheringSpot.label: Carnicería
LanguageData.ButcheringSpot.description: Una mesa improvisada para cortar en pedazos de carne cruda criaturas muertas.
LanguageData.ButcheringSpot_Blueprint.label: butchering spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.ButcheringSpot_Frame.label: butchering spot (building)
LanguageData.ButcheringSpot_Frame.description: A makeshift spot for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.TableButcherNeolithic.label: Mesa de carnicería pequeña
LanguageData.TableButcherNeolithic.description: Una mesa pesada para cortar en pedazos de carne cruda criaturas muertas.
LanguageData.TableButcherNeolithic_Blueprint.label: small butcher table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableButcherNeolithic_Frame.label: small butcher table (building)
LanguageData.TableButcherNeolithic_Frame.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.TableOven.label: Horno de cocina
LanguageData.TableOven.description: Un horno de combustible para hornear dulces y delicias sabrosas. Puede ser alimentado por leña, carbón vegetal, carbón mineral y material de madera.
LanguageData.TableOven_Blueprint.label: oven (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableOven_Frame.label: oven (building)
LanguageData.TableOven_Frame.description: A fueled oven for baking candies and tasty treats. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.CandyTable.label: Mesa de caramelos
LanguageData.CandyTable.description: Una mesa para para hacer chocolate, caramelo y taffy. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.CandyTable_Blueprint.label: candy table (blueprint)
LanguageData.CandyTable_Frame.label: candy table (building)
LanguageData.CandyTable_Frame.description: A candy-making table used to make chocolate, caramel and taffy. Requires power.
LanguageData.GrindStone.label: Piedra de moler
LanguageData.GrindStone.description: Una pequeña piedra trituradora accionada por músculos para moler rápidamente las plantas crudas.
LanguageData.GrindStone_Blueprint.label: milling stone (blueprint)
LanguageData.GrindStone_Frame.label: milling stone (building)
LanguageData.GrindStone_Frame.description: A small muscle-powered grinding stone for quickly grinding raw plants.
LanguageData.ElectricBrewery.label: Cervecería eléctrica
LanguageData.ElectricBrewery.description: Una estación de trabajo con todo el equipo necesario para preparar bebidas alcohólicas y etanol combustible. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.ElectricBrewery_Blueprint.label: electric brewery (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricBrewery_Frame.label: electric brewery (building)
LanguageData.ElectricBrewery_Frame.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew alocholic drinks and ethanol fuel. Requires power.
LanguageData.cider_Barrel.label: Barril de sidra de manzana
LanguageData.cider_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of apple cider (blueprint)
LanguageData.cider_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of apple cider (building)
LanguageData.rum_Barrel.label: Barril de ron
LanguageData.rum_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of rum (blueprint)
LanguageData.rum_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of rum (building)
LanguageData.Wine_Barrel.label: Barril de vino
LanguageData.Wine_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of wine (blueprint)
LanguageData.Wine_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of wine (building)
LanguageData.strawberrywine_Barrel.label: Barril de vino de baya
LanguageData.strawberrywine_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of berry wine (blueprint)
LanguageData.strawberrywine_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of berry wine (building)
LanguageData.saki_Barrel.label: Barril de sake
LanguageData.saki_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of sake (blueprint)
LanguageData.saki_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of sake (building)
LanguageData.vodka_Barrel.label: Barril de vodka
LanguageData.vodka_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of vodka (blueprint)
LanguageData.vodka_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of vodka (building)
LanguageData.tequila_Barrel.label: Barril de tequila
LanguageData.tequila_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of tequila (blueprint)
LanguageData.tequila_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of tequila (building)
LanguageData.Whiskey_Barrel.label: Barril de whisky
LanguageData.Whiskey_Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel of whiskey (blueprint)
LanguageData.Whiskey_Barrel_Frame.label: barrel of whiskey (building)
LanguageData.TableCoffee.label: Maquina de café
LanguageData.TableCoffee.description: Una máquina para la preparación de café. También puede producir té. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.TableCoffee_Blueprint.label: coffee machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableCoffee_Frame.label: coffee machine (building)
LanguageData.TableCoffee_Frame.description: A machine for the preparation of coffee. It can also produce tea. Requires power.
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand.label: Aserradero de mano
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand.description: Una pequeña sierra manual de músculo para cortar leños en tablas y leña.
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand_Blueprint.label: hand sawmill (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand_Frame.label: hand sawmill (building)
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand_Frame.description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting logs into planks and kindling.
LanguageData.TableFurnace.label: Horno
LanguageData.TableFurnace.description: Un horno utilizado para la fundición de minerales metálicos básicos en aleaciones metálicas. Puede hacer latas de metal y producir carbón de leña. Puede ser alimentado por leña, carbón, carbón, turba y material de madera.
LanguageData.TableFurnace_Blueprint.label: furnace (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableFurnace_Frame.label: furnace (building)
LanguageData.TableFurnace_Frame.description: A furnace used for smelting basic metal ores into metal alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from logs. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal, Peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.Kiln.label: Horno
LanguageData.Kiln.description: Un horno improvisado utilizado para producir ladrillos de arcilla, quemar ropa y utilizarlo como crematorio. Puede ser alimentado por leña, carbón mineral, carbón vegetal, turba y material de madera.
LanguageData.Kiln_Blueprint.label: kiln (blueprint)
LanguageData.Kiln_Frame.label: kiln (building)
LanguageData.Kiln_Frame.description: An improvised kiln used to produce clay bricks, burning apparel and used as crematorium. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal, Peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.GlassworkTable.label: Mesa de vidrio
LanguageData.GlassworkTable.description: Una mesa con todas las herramientas que necesitas para hacer vidrio. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.GlassworkTable_Blueprint.label: glassworks table (blueprint)
LanguageData.GlassworkTable_Frame.label: glassworks table (building)
LanguageData.GlassworkTable_Frame.description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass. Requires power.
LanguageData.LeatherworkerTable.label: Mesa de cuero
LanguageData.LeatherworkerTable.description: Una mesa de trabajo para la confección de ropa de cuero a partir de pieles crudas.
LanguageData.LeatherworkerTable_Blueprint.label: leatherworker table (blueprint)
LanguageData.LeatherworkerTable_Frame.label: leatherworker table (building)
LanguageData.LeatherworkerTable_Frame.description: A worktable for crafting leather clothing from raw hides.
LanguageData.TableLoom.label: Telar de sastre
LanguageData.TableLoom.description: Un telar de sastre que se utiliza para convertir las materias primas en textiles utilizables. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.TableLoom_Blueprint.label: tailor's loom (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableLoom_Frame.label: tailor's loom (building)
LanguageData.TableLoom_Frame.description: A tailor's loom that is used to spin raw materials into usable textiles. Requires power.
LanguageData.BenchRecycle.label: Banco de reciclaje textil
LanguageData.BenchRecycle.description: Un banco para reciclar ropa usada en textiles utilizables. Recupera el 50% del material original utilizado para el artículo. La ropa hecha de más de un recurso no devolverá nada. Requiere energía. Velocidad normal.
LanguageData.BenchRecycle_Blueprint.label: recycle textile bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.BenchRecycle_Frame.label: recycle textile bench (building)
LanguageData.BenchRecycle_Frame.description: A bench to recycle used apparel into useable textiles. Recovers 50% of the original material used for the item. Apparel made from more than one resource will return nothing. Requires power. Normal speed.
LanguageData.ElectricTableRepair.label: Mesa de trabajo de reparación
LanguageData.ElectricTableRepair.description: Requiere kit de reparación para un trabajo. Un banco de trabajo equipado con todas las herramientas necesarias para reparar y reparar los elementos dañados. Funciona a una velocidad del 40% cuando no está alimentado por electricidad. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.ElectricTableRepair_Blueprint.label: mending workbench (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricTableRepair_Frame.label: mending workbench (building)
LanguageData.ElectricTableRepair_Frame.description: Requires Repair kit for a work. A workbench equipped with all the tools required to mend and repair damaged items. Works at 40% speed when not powered. Requires power.
LanguageData.TableStonecutterNeolithic.label: Banco cortador de piedra
LanguageData.TableStonecutterNeolithic.description: Una mesa de trabajo equipada para cortar piedra áspera en pequeños adoquines de piedra.
LanguageData.TableStonecutterNeolithic_Frame.label: stonecutter's bench (building)
LanguageData.TableStonecutterNeolithic_Frame.descript: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into small stone cobbles.
LanguageData.ConcreteMixer.label: Hormigonera manual
LanguageData.ConcreteMixer.description: Un mezclador de hormigón manual. El hormigón se mezcla de escombros y arena.
LanguageData.ConcreteMixer_Blueprint.label: hand concrete mixer (blueprint)
LanguageData.ConcreteMixer_Frame.label: hand concrete mixer (building)
LanguageData.ConcreteMixer_Frame.description: A muscle-powered concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand.
LanguageData.CompostBin.label: Cesto de basura
LanguageData.CompostBin.description: Ayuda a acelerar el proceso de la fabricacion de fertilizante.
LanguageData.CompostBin_Blueprint.label: compost bin (blueprint)
LanguageData.CompostBin_Frame.label: compost bin (building)
LanguageData.CompostBin_Frame.description: Helps speed up the composting process.
LanguageData.FertilizerProductionMachine.label: Máquina de producción de fertilizantes
LanguageData.FertilizerProductionMachine.description: Use plantas para producir fertilizantes. ¡Requiere instalar cerca de la tolva!
LanguageData.FertilizerProductionMachine_Frame.label: fertilizer production machine (building)
LanguageData.FertilizerProductionMachine_Frame.descri: Use plants to produce fertilizer. Requires to install near hopper!
LanguageData.WeaponCraftingWorkTable.label: Banco de trabajo de elaboración de armas
LanguageData.WeaponCraftingWorkTable.description: Un banco de trabajo que produce armas a distancia como pistolas y rifles. Puede fundir las armas en metal. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.WeaponCraftingWorkTable_Blueprint.label: weapon crafting workbench (blueprint)
LanguageData.WeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.label: weapon crafting workbench (building)
LanguageData.WeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.descriptio: A workbench that produces ranged weapons like pistols and rifles. Can smelt weapons down into metal. Requires power.
LanguageData.AdvWeaponCraftingWorkTable.label: Mesa de trabajo de artesanía avanzada
LanguageData.AdvWeaponCraftingWorkTable.description: Un banco de trabajo que produce armas de alcance avanzado como rifles de asalto militares, lanzadores de misiles y ametralladoras pesadas. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.AdvWeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.label: advanced weapon crafting workbench (building)
LanguageData.AdvWeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.descrip: A workbench that produces advanced ranged weapons like military assault rifles, missile launchers and heavy machine guns. Requires power.
LanguageData.AmmoBench.label: Mesa de artesanía de munición
LanguageData.AmmoBench.description: Una mesa de elaboración que produce munición para su uso en armas y torretas. También puede producir azufre a partir del mineral de hierro. Potencia necesaria: 500W. Puede funcionar sin electricidad al 30% de la velocidad normal.
LanguageData.AmmoBench_Blueprint.label: ammo crafting table (blueprint)
LanguageData.AmmoBench_Frame.label: ammo crafting table (building)
LanguageData.AmmoBench_Frame.description: A crafting table that produces ammunition for use in guns and turrets. Can also produce sulfur from iron ore. Power needed: 500 W. Can work without electricity at 30% of normal speed.
LanguageData.HeavyArmsBench.label: Torno de armas pesadas
LanguageData.HeavyArmsBench.description: Una mesa de elaboración que produce munición para su uso con torretas. También puede producir azufre a partir del mineral de hierro. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.HeavyArmsBench_Blueprint.label: heavy arms lathe (blueprint)
LanguageData.HeavyArmsBench_Frame.label: heavy arms lathe (building)
LanguageData.HeavyArmsBench_Frame.description: A crafting table that produces ammunition for use with turrets. Can also produce sulfur from iron ore. Requires power.
LanguageData.TablePrimitiveProsthetic.label: Banco primitivo de prótesis
LanguageData.TablePrimitiveProsthetic.description: Un banco de trabajo equipado para la producción de prótesis.
LanguageData.TablePrimitiveProsthetic_Blueprint.label: primitive prosthetics bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.TablePrimitiveProsthetic_Frame.label: primitive prosthetics bench (building)
LanguageData.TablePrimitiveProsthetic_Frame.descripti: A workbench equipped for production of basic prosthetics.
LanguageData.TableBasicProsthetic.label: Banco de prótesis
LanguageData.TableBasicProsthetic.description: Un banco de trabajo equipado para la producción de prótesis muy simples. Requiere energía.
LanguageData.TableBasicProsthetic_Blueprint.label: prosthetics workbench (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableBasicProsthetic_Frame.label: prosthetics workbench (building)
LanguageData.TableBasicProsthetic_Frame.description: A workbench equipped for production of very simple prosthetics. Requires power.
